DOC.brief_summary: The study objective is to investigate the clinical applicability of continuous IOP measurement using TS with radio transmission over 24 hours. - Trial with medical device
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Application of Sensimed Triggerfish Sensor (TS) With Wireless Signal Transmission for Continuous Intraocular Pressure Measurement
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Clinical diagnosis of glaucoma Exclusion criteria: Other opticus neuropathy than glaucoma Corneal abnormalities (e.g. scaring) Dry eye disease
